ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Shadowed Knife
ygData.msgSnippet: Only the shadow men items for the nec quest are no rent, everything else is usually no drop and lore. The fire opal can be bought off of one of the npcs in the
ygData.messageBody:
Only the shadow men items for the nec quest are no rent, everything else is
usually no drop and lore.

The fire opal can be bought off of one of the npcs in the temple, I think
her name is Geenie or something like that. She is on the upper level of the
temple directly across where you go down for the nec quests

-----Original Message-----
From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
Sent: Monday, July 24, 2000 4:50 PM
To: EQ_Necromancers
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Shadowed Knife


Hi folks,

Can someone tell me if the "Shadowed Knife", from the goblin Headmaster,
used for the Harvester quest, is NO RENT like shadowed man stuff?

Thanks,
Mujahid 34 Necro. Solusek Ro
